Row.Name: Scout Wars (Classic)
Row.Description: The classic, purest form of Scout Wars.
Row.LongDescription: Now begins your greatest quest: from this early cradle of civilization towards becoming the victor of the Scout Wars.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Fight to the death to defeat your enemies – including Barbarians – using nothing but Scouts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The classic, purest form of Scout Wars.
